response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a value for those looking for the best. Given its worth to us, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $120. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering its actual value stands at $150. We believe this price offers a great deal for both of us. Looking forward to your positive response!", "product_price": 120}
